t: Kettle & Fire wholesale products
s: Kettle & Fire was founded in 2015 by Justin and Nick Mares in an effort to fill a need. Convenient, well-sourced, nutrient-dense + delicious bone broths were not available on the market. We combine marrow bones with 100% organic spices, herbs, and vegetables with filtered water in steel kettles.
